Blackfangs jumps up at the statement and Ragnar stares at her 
unbelieving.

Blackfang: What?! You mean they're making the first moves? We gotta 
warn Rodimus! Come, we'll tell Kup.

He leaves the room in a hurry, hoping she'll follow him.

Ragnar: Telepath? That really exists? Well, I would bet some Nova Cats 
or Goliath Scorpions would love to have you as a bondsman!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Empath leans back in her chair and props her feet on the table.  
"For 
> starters, they're on their way here.  Now.  And before you ask, I'm 
> telepathic."
>
